content.rendered:
7-figure British

Amazon Seller? Welcome home.

​Welcome to 

The 10K Collective Mastermind

We give you a small, intimate group to belong to. A set of peers to learn from.

And be inspired by. And to compete with! 

what we do

why we do it

testimonials

prices

What we do

Intimate groups, in Person

We meet in person in London multiple times a year. Group sizes are limited to 12 people max in the room. 

The main focus is the hot-seat, where you’re guaranteed to have focus on you and your personal business each time.

We also meet on Zoom on in-between months. Again in really small groups. We include expert-led sessions, which have included: intellectual property law, selling your business and annual planning, among many others. 

In-person

Online is lonely. Online gets overwhelming. In person means connection at a human level. And finally making sense of the info you’ve got.

Small Groups

There is no shortage of cheer-leading big groups in person in the industry. Nor of mass webinars. We keep it tiny for trust, and getting to real know each other. 

Interactive for you personally

Who needs yet another webinar or Youtube video? What matters isn’t info any more. It’s how you decide to apply it yourself. In your business. That’s where we shine.  

why we do it

We’ve been there

Connection

Business building is lonely. Online is lonely. Business building online…you get the picture. 

There is no substitute for forming relationships in person. Even a Zoom meeting with people you’ve had a beer with is different.

Personalised

And building a business online is overwhelming. There is FAR more info than any human could absord. None of us really need more info. We need the RIGHT info at the RIGHT time. And above all we need to make good decisions. Wrestling with those decisions? That’s when your peers are here to help.

Connection

We may be online entrepreneurs but we’re still humans. Humans evolved to work in small groups. Period. Remove that and we flounder. Reconnect, and we get repowered. Simple 

In practice this means

  • Much higher motivation
  • A bit of friendly competition works wonders!
  • Talking things through brings clarity
  • Taking plans over with your peers brings confidence
  • If you have a specific technical problem, chances are a fellow member has had it too. Solutions by your peers are the most tried and tested of all. Because like you, their business depends on them

testimonials

What they say

STEVE CONSALVI

E-Commerce Entrepreneur

STEVE REEVE

E-Commerce Entrepreneur

TIM SCOTT

E-Commerce Entrepreneur

PETE GREEENWOOD

E-Commerce Entrepreneur

Apply today
